title: Quick Sort
steps: Select a pivot element from the array. The choice of the pivot can affect the algorithm's efficiency.
Partition the array into two sub-arrays: elements less than the pivot and elements greater than the pivot.
Recursively apply Quick Sort to both sub-arrays.
Combine the sorted sub-arrays and the pivot to get the final sorted array.

complexity.time: O(n log n) average, O(n^2) worst
